channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adopting agentic AI? Build AI fluency, redesign workflows, don’t neglect supervision
item.description: How can organizations decide how to use human-in-the-loop mechanisms and collaborative frameworks with AI agents?

item.title: RealMan displays embodied robotics at Automate 2025
item.description: RealMan Robotics debuted AI-powered robotic arms and modular platforms, highlighting innovations for manufacturing, research, and healthcare. The post...

item.title: Persona AI raises $27M to develop humanoid robots for shipyards
item.description: Persona AI said it has already signed an agreement with HD Hyundai to deploy humanoid robots into shipyards. The post Persona AI raises $27M to develo...

item.title: What is AI really giving back to tech investors? Here’s the hard truth.
item.description: AI boosters cling to fanciful forecasts — even if meaningful revenue and productivity has yet to materialize.

item.title: My father’s widow keeps sending me $200 checks in the mail. Why would she do this?
item.description: “I sent a ‘thank you’ card and asked what it was for, but I got no answer.”

item.title: Medicare patients getting emergency surgery in private-equity hospitals are 42% more likely to die in the next 30 days. What’s going on?
item.description: New research raises concerns about the way these investment funds balance care and the pursuit of profits.

item.title: I’m 57 and ready to retire next year on $7,500 a month, but my wife says no. Who’s right?
item.description: “I also have $300,000 in a 401(k). My wife has a 403(b) that currently sits at $650,000.”

item.title: I have $50,000 in credit-card debt after my divorce, but received $30,000 after a car wreck. Do I buy a used Lexus?
item.description: “I previously drove a fully loaded BMW X7, and driving a used Lexus feels like a big drop.”

item.title: Google’s AlphaEvolve: The AI agent that reclaimed 0.7% of Google’s compute – and how to copy it
item.description: Google's AlphaEvolve is the epitome of a best-practice AI agent orchestration. It offers a lesson in production-grade agent engineering. Discover its ...

item.title: ABB deploys PixelPaint at Mercedes-Benz plant in Germany
item.description: ABB said the painting system is both sustainable and resource-saving, and it began operating in the Mercedes facility earlier this year. The post ABB ...

item.title: Shrink exploit windows, slash MTTP: Why ring deployment is now a must for enterprise defense
item.description: Ring deployment slashes MTTP and legacy CVE risk. Learn how Ivanti and Southstar Bank are modernizing patch strategy with real-time intel.

item.title: MIT engineers create elder assist robot E-BAR to prevent falls at home
item.description: MIT researchers have developed the E-BAR system to assist older adults in safe movement around the household. The post MIT engineers create elder assi...

item.title: OpenAI launches research preview of Codex AI software engineering agent for developers — with parallel tasking
item.description: Starting today it will be available as a research preview for ChatGPT Pro, Enterprise, and Team users, with support later for Plus and Edu.

item.title: Acer unveils AI-powered wearables at Computex 2025
item.description: Acer Gadget, a subsidiary of Acer, unveiled AI-powered wearables at the Computex 2025 trade show in Taiwan.
